home.home_welcome: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you can learn more about my projects and skills.

about.about_me_intro: Hi! My name is Maksym, and I am a developer experienced in building modern web applications. I specialize in React, Tailwind CSS, and other modern technologies.
about.about_me_portfolio: In this portfolio, you will find my projects, skills, and contact information. Thank you for visiting my site!
about.about_me_thanks: That's me! Thank you for visiting my site.

4.title: üè® Hotel Mardan: Booking Website Redesign
4.problem: The old site lacked credibility. It wasn't responsive and had no integration with booking services. The owner was losing clients, with all bookings coming through phone calls.
4.solution:
Audit of the current site ‚Üí identified 12 UX issues
Developed 3 design concepts in Figma
Built a site from scratch using HTML, CSS, JS
Integration with Booking.com API
Set up analytics (GA) and event tracking
Optimized speed and SEO
4.results:
+45% online bookings in 2 months
Improved Google rankings for key search terms
Increased customer trust (30% growth in reviews)
Owner transitioned to full online processing
4.technologies: HTML ‚Ä¢ CSS ‚Ä¢ JS ‚Ä¢ Figma ‚Ä¢ Booking.com API ‚Ä¢ Google Analytics

5.title: üè† Engel & V√∂lkers: Digital Navigation System
5.problem: Marketing team was spending hours coordinating tasks, documents were stored in dozens of different sources, and there was a lack of synchronization between departments.
5.solution:
Internal communications audit
Building a coordination system: "Digital Navigation"
Creating dashboards for tracking tasks
Integration with Notion and internal CRM
Setting up access rights and notifications
5.results:
Reduced time spent searching for information (by 3x)
Increased creative team productivity
System recommended for implementation in other departments
5.technologies: Notion ‚Ä¢ Zapier ‚Ä¢ Figma ‚Ä¢ Workflow Design ‚Ä¢ Internal Docs

6.title: üéØ Service_in_Ua: Content Marketing and Social Media Growth
6.problem: Insufficient audience growth, ineffective videos, dispersed team without a management system.
6.solution:
Content strategy creation (YouTube + Instagram)
Implementation of CRM + task trackers
Setting up a production pipeline for videos
Target and retargeting optimization
Conducted 10 training sessions for the team
6.results:
YouTube growth: from 800 ‚Üí 20,000 subscribers
Instagram growth: from 950 ‚Üí 10,000 followers
Team became self-managing
Brand recognition in new markets
6.technologies: YouTube Studio ‚Ä¢ Notion ‚Ä¢ Adobe Premiere ‚Ä¢ Meta Ads

7.title: ‚öôÔ∏è R_Apple: Business Automation and Growth in 5 Cities
7.problem: Business was growing rapidly, but management and motivation systems were missing. Processes depended on people.
7.solution:
CRM system implementation and sales scripts
KPI development and transparent motivation system
Accounting, logistics, and control automation
Scaling to 5 cities
7.results:
+250% team productivity
Transparent control and fewer human errors
Established corporate culture
7.technologies: AmoCRM ‚Ä¢ Google Sheets Automation ‚Ä¢ HR Framework

8.title: üöò Car Wash Station: Online Booking and Automation
8.problem: Car wash services were offered offline only. There was no website, booking system, or digital promotion.
8.solution:
Development of a one-page site with services and booking form
Telegram notifications and email integration
Design and coding from scratch (HTML/CSS/JS)
Domain and hosting setup
8.results:
+30% new clients in the 1st month
0 ‚Üí 100% online presence
Increased loyalty of regular customers
8.technologies: HTML ‚Ä¢ CSS ‚Ä¢ JavaScript ‚Ä¢ PHP ‚Ä¢ Figma ‚Ä¢ Telegram API ‚Ä¢ Hosting

9.title: üõ† Garage Racer: Accounting and CRM System for Auto Service
9.problem: Inefficient tracking of orders, parts, and clients. Work was done in Excel and on paper ‚Üí frequent errors and losses.
9.solution:
Development of internal web application (CMS + inventory)
Tracking of vehicles, repair stages, order integration
User roles: mechanics, managers, admin
Report generation, reminders, and analytics
9.results:
‚Äì40% errors in orders
25% faster processes
Transition from Excel to a system with transparent control
9.technologies: PHP ‚Ä¢ JavaScript ‚Ä¢ MySQL ‚Ä¢ Bootstrap ‚Ä¢ UI Design

10.title: üïäÔ∏è Avikan: Bird Tracking Application
10.problem: Lack of accessible birdwatching tool with photos, audio, and classification.
10.solution:
Full SPA on React
API integration with data on 11,000 birds
Filters by species, region, sounds
Backend on Ruby on Rails + PostgreSQL
Mobile adaptation
10.results:
Created MVP in 2 weeks
Received high marks on demo day
Used by the birdwatching community
10.technologies: React ‚Ä¢ Ruby on Rails ‚Ä¢ PostgreSQL ‚Ä¢ Tailwind ‚Ä¢ Figma ‚Ä¢ External API

timeline.year_2023_desc: Learned React, Tailwind, PostgreSQL. Developed Avikan app. Boosted YouTube from 800 to 20K at Service_in_Ua.

timeline.year_2021_desc: Researched IT industry. Learned JavaScript basics. Worked on early mockups and site structures.
timeline.year_2020_desc: Launched a full website for a local car wash. Gained first development experience.
timeline.year_2019_desc: Managed R_Apple operations. Handled automation, hiring, and internal systems development.
timeline.year_2018_desc: Built internal tools for auto repair shop. First experience with practical software design.
timeline.year_2017_desc: Developed a hotel management app with booking, cleaning, and reports. Focus on usability.
timeline.year_2016_desc: Founded R_Apple. Grew to 5 offices in 5 cities. Created transparent motivation systems.
timeline.year_2015_desc: Earned Bachelor's degree in Chemistry. Searching for new directions and passions.
